name: grr_hunt_file
description:
Starts a GRR hunt for a list of files and provides a Hunt ID to the user.
Feed the Hunt ID to grr_huntresults_plaso_timesketch to process results through plaso and send them to Timesketch.
short_description: Starts a GRR hunt for a list of files.
args: Comma-separated list of file paths to hunt for
Whether to verify the GRR TLS certificate
Maximum size of files to collect (in bytes)
